markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Rebuke Death](/Spells.aspx?ID=1809)
<actions string="Single Action to Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Vitality" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=509" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 376 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Domain**
[Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=78)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 20-foot emanation

**Target** 1 living creature per action spent to Cast this spell
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You snatch creatures from the jaws of death, restoring them without the strain of a typical close call. You can spend 1 to 3 actions Casting this Spell, and you can target a number of creatures equal to the actions spent. Each target regains 3d6 Hit Points. If the target had the [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11) condition, coming back from dying due to this healing doesn't increase its [wounded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=42) condition.

---
**Heightened (+1)** Increase the healing by 1d6.
name: Rebuke Death
